title: PATCH NOT UPDATING
body:
Please help
Since last night ive been trying to update to the new patch 6.21 and its not working..it keeps saying update error at 33%
please help dying to play

replies.body:
Errors at 33% or later are typically caused by the patcher not being able to maintain a good connection to the patching servers. I recommend you take a look at our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps that usually resolve this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change for you.
